model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Co-workers A: I feel so grateful to have a boss who is always so supportive of me.

[MEMORY]
User Description: Co-workers B is a director with no specific personal information available such as age, birthday, gender, height, weight, zodiac sign, Chinese zodiac sign, hometown, occupation, employer, education, or location. Their relationship status is also undisclosed.

Relationship Description: Co-workers A and Co-workers B met on set and developed a good friendship. Despite initial intimidation, Co-workers A realized that Co-workers B is down-to-earth and easy to work with. They brought out the best in each other during the shoot, collaborated to make the movie successful, and are excited about future projects, possibly starting their own production company.

Event Description: Co-workers A blew up a rabbit with a stick of dynamite, which caused anger and frustration. Co-workers B questioned this action and advised Co-workers A to talk to the director about easing up on the schedule. Co-workers A acknowledged their mistake, felt bad, and thanked Co-workers B for the support and reminder to learn from mistakes. Additionally, Co-workers A saw a spider on the way to work and freaked out, revealing a childhood fear of spiders. Co-workers B suggested facing this fear as part of the process of dealing with frustrations. Co-workers A also surprised Co-workers B with their jewelry making talent, reflecting on personal growth and progress.
